mapper.sql: ticket_id, serial_number, work_ticket_type_id, standard_ticket_id, workorder_id, order_id, maintainer, maintain_date, status, flow_status, work_position, wind_id, crew_id, applicant, apply_time, work_team, work_head, position_id, position_desc, equipment_id, equipment_desc, work_member, member_num, plan_start_time, plan_end_time, double_naem, work_place, work_content, work_condition, signer, sign_time, run_main_person, receive_head, receive_time, scene_licensor, run_licensor, license_start_time, work_team_opinion, head_change_to, head_change_signer, head_chaneg_time, delay_time, delay_head, delay_head_sign_time, delay_licensor, delay_licensor_sign_time, work_end_head, work_end_licensor, work_end_time, ticket_end_licensor, ticket_end_time, unuse_wire_number, unuse_wire_num, knife_car_num, guardian, guardian_place_and_cont, guardian_other_thing, evaluation, evaluation_cont, evaluation_time

a.ticket_id as ticket_id, a.serial_number as serial_number, a.work_ticket_type_id as work_ticket_type_id, a.standard_ticket_id as standard_ticket_id, a.workorder_id as workorder_id, a.order_id as double_naem, a.work_place as work_place, a.work_content as work_content, a.work_condition as work_condition, a.signer as signer, a.sign_time as sign_time, a.run_main_person as run_main_person, a.receive_head as receive_head, a.receive_time as receive_time, a.scene_licensor as scene_licensor, a.run_licensor as run_licensor, a.license_start_time as license_start_time, a.work_team_opinion as work_team_opinion, a.head_change_to as head_change_to, a.head_change_signer as head_change_signer, a.head_chaneg_time as head_chaneg_time, a.delay_time as delay_time, a.delay_head as delay_head, a.delay_head_sign_time as delay_head_sign_time, a.delay_licensor as delay_licensor, a.delay_licensor_sign_time as delay_licensor_sign_time, a.work_end_head as work_end_head, a.work_end_licensor as work_end_licensor, a.work_end_time as work_end_time, a.ticket_end_licensor as ticket_end_licensor, a.ticket_end_time as ticket_end_time, a.unuse_wire_number as unuse_wire_number, a.unuse_wire_num as unuse_wire_num, a.knife_car_num as knife_car_num, a.guardian as guardian, a.guardian_place_and_cont as guardian_place_and_cont, a.guardian_other_thing as guardian_other_thing, a.evaluation as evaluation, a.evaluation_cont as evaluation_cont, a.evaluation_time as evaluation_time, b.architecture_name as wind_name,d.crew_name as crew_name,e.position_name as position_name,f.equipment_name as equipment_name, g.ticket_type_number as ticket_type_number,g.ticket_type_name as ticket_type_name,h.standard_ticket_name as standard_ticket_name,i.title as flow_status_name, j.architecture_name as work_team_name,k.process_sort as flow_sort, l.name as flow_name, ua.user_name as maintainer_name,ub.user_name as applicant_name,uc.user_name as work_head_name, ud.user_name as signer_name,ue.user_name as run_main_person_name,uf.user_name as receive_head_name, ug.user_name as scene_licensor_name,uh.user_name as run_licensor_name,ui.user_name as head_change_to_name, uj.user_name as head_change_signer_name,uk.user_name as delay_head_name,ul.user_name as delay_licensor_name, um.user_name as work_end_head_name,un.user_name as work_end_licensor_name,uo.user_name as ticket_end_licensor_name, up.user_name as guardian_name,uq.user_name as evaluation_name
mapper.select:
select
from work_ticket a left join org_architecture b on a.wind_id = b.architecture_code and b.architecture_type = '02' left join crew_information d on a.crew_id = d.crew_id left join position_encode e on a.position_id = e.position_id left join equipment_asset_ledger f on a.equipment_id = f.equipment_asset_id left join work_ticket_type g on a.work_ticket_type_id = g.work_ticket_type_id left join standard_work_ticket h on a.standard_ticket_id = h.standard_ticket_id left join sp_code i on (a.flow_status = i.name and i.code_type_id = '1046') left join org_architecture j on a.work_team = j.architecture_id left join process k on a.ticket_id = k.order_id left join process_detail l on (k.process_id = l.process_id and k.process_sort = sort) left join isc_user ua on a.maintainer = ua.user_id left join isc_user ub on a.applicant = ub.user_id left join isc_user uc on a.work_head = uc.user_id left join isc_user ud on a.signer = ud.user_id left join isc_user ue on a.run_main_person = ue.user_id left join isc_user uf on a.receive_head = uf.user_id left join isc_user ug on a.scene_licensor = ug.user_id left join isc_user uh on a.run_licensor = uh.user_id left join isc_user ui on a.head_change_to = ui.user_id left join isc_user uj on a.head_change_signer = uj.user_id left join isc_user uk on a.delay_head = uk.user_id left join isc_user ul on a.delay_licensor = ul.user_id left join isc_user um on a.work_end_head = um.user_id left join isc_user un on a.work_end_licensor = un.user_id left join isc_user uo on a.ticket_end_licensor = uo.user_id left join isc_user up on a.guardian = up.user_id left join isc_user uq on a.evaluation = uq.user_id where a.status != '0' and a.ticket_id = #{ticketId}
mapper.sql: a.ticket_id as ticket_id, a.serial_number as ticket_number, a.work_team as work_team, d.architecture_name as work_team_name, b.ticket_type_name as ticket_type_name, a.status as status, a.applicant as applicant, f.user_name as applicant_name, a.apply_time as apply_time, a.work_content as work_content
mapper.select:
select
from work_ticket a left join work_ticket_type b on a.work_ticket_type_id = b.work_ticket_type_id left join org_architecture d on a.work_team = d.architecture_id left join isc_user f on a.applicant = f.user_id where a.status != '0' and a.workorder_id = #{workorderId} order by a.serial_number desc

select
from work_ticket a left join work_ticket_type b on a.work_ticket_type_id = b.work_ticket_type_id left join org_architecture d on a.work_team = d.architecture_id left join isc_user f on a.applicant = f.user_id where a.status != '0' and a.order_id = #{orderId} order by a.serial_number desc

SELECT isc_role.role_name FROM isc_role,isc_user,isc_role_user_rela WHERE isc_user.user_name=#{userName} and isc_user.user_id=isc_role_user_rela.user_id and isc_role_user_rela.role_id=isc_role.role_id
SELECT record_id FROM workorder_flow_record WHERE deploy_sort="2" AND deal_result="完成"

select
distinct
from work_ticket
order by ${orderByClause}
